Shrowd Exotic Helm.Unique: Upon your first death, become a shadow clone that deals 100% increased damage for 15 seconds.

Shrowd Exotic Weapon.Description: The Hunger is a craftable Exotic weapon in Dauntless. It is crafted from Shrowd reagents.

Rezakiri Exotic Helm.Unique: While active, reviving another player fully restores both players but removes the Prism even at full danger.
